concept.title: About This Guide
concept.shortdesc: This guide will help you learn how to operate and manage your TA gateway.

conbody.p: Yeastar TA1600/2400/3200 FXS Analog VoIP Gateways are cutting-edge products that connect legacy telephones, fax machines and PBX systems with IP telephony networks and IP-based PBX systems. Featuring rich functionalities and easy configuration, Yeastar TA is ideal for small and medium enterprises that wish to integrate a traditional phone system into IP-based system. Yeastar TA helps them to preserve previous investment on legacy telephone system and reduce communication costs significantly with the true benefits of VoIP.

section.title: Audience
section.p: This manual will help you learn how to operate and manage your TA1600/2400/3200 FXS Analog VoIP Gateway. In this guide, we describe every detail on the functionality and configuration of TA1600/2400/3200. We begin by assuming that you are interested in TA1600/2400/3200 and familiar with networking and other IT disciplines.

ul.li: Do not open the device when the device is powered on.
Do not work on the device, connect or disconnect cables when lightning strikes.
Fully compliant with SIP and IAX2
